# netris_bgp (Resource)

## Schema

### Required

- **localip** (String) Local IP. Example 10.0.1.1/24
- **name** (String) The name of the resource, also acts as it's unique ID
- **remoteip** (String) Remote IP. Example 10.0.1.2/24
- **site** (String) A description of an item
